title.rendered: Repricing for Amazon with Hai Mag of Eva.Guru – Part 2

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:35 — 31.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:35 — 31.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Hai Mag is an eCommerce Entrepreneur, Growth Leader, and Investor with experience in North America, Europe, Asia, and Africa. He is the CEO and Co-Founder of Eva.

He was the former vice president of Oracle, he was in the enterprise software world for the last 20 years; Eva.guru is a platform to increase profits for Amazon sellers by restocking, repricing, reimbursement, and getting accurate profit numbers. 

 

You’ll Learn: 

  • What the most important errors/information gaps are there to avoid
  • How all the costs are dynamic, and therefore Dynamic pricing is inevitable
  • The numbers that we should keep our eye on
  • How Eva works to save you time and money
